summary: Command line utilities for profile files.

top_level_symbols.name: _cmd_audit
top_level_symbols.doc:
Audit profiles against annotation speakers. Args:
    ns: Parsed argparse namespace with ``profiles`` and ``annotations`` paths.

top_level_symbols.name: _scan_voices
top_level_symbols.doc: Return available voice IDs from a directory or a small default set.

top_level_symbols.name: _cmd_generate
top_level_symbols.doc:
Generate a starter profiles YAML from annotations. Args:
    ns: Parsed argparse namespace containing ``annotations`` path and
        output options.

top_level_symbols.name: main
top_level_symbols.doc: Entry point for the profiles CLI.
